com.commercetools.sunrise.productcatalog.productdetail

Class SunriseProductDetailController

  • java.lang.Object
    • play.mvc.Results
      • play.mvc.Controller
        • com.commercetools.sunrise.common.controllers.SunriseFrameworkController
          • com.commercetools.sunrise.productcatalog.productdetail.SunriseProductDetailController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WithOverwriteableTemplateName, play.mvc.Http.HeaderNames, play.mvc.Http.Status
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ProductDetailController

    public abstract class SunriseProductDetailController
extends SunriseFrameworkController
implements WithOverwriteableTemplateName
    Controller to show the information about a single product. Loads one ProductProjection and the selected ProductVariant.

    Components that may be a fit

    • ProductSuggestionsControllerComponent
